name: Orchestral Strings
description: Beautiful orchestral string ensemble with expressive vibrato and dynamics

performance.notes: Orchestral string ensemble loaded from SoundFont. Slow attack (0.15s) for smooth swell. High sustain (0.8) for sustained notes. Medium release (0.4) for natural decay. Vibrato adds warmth. Round-robin sampling prevents machine gun effect. Expressive dynamics through velocity.
performance.technique: Load orchestral SoundFont preset. Use slow attack/release for smooth strings. Enable vibrato for warmth. Round-robin sampling creates variation. Velocity controls dynamics. Filter can soften/harden sound.
performance.tip: Use CC1 (mod wheel) for vibrato depth. Use CC11 (expression) for dynamics. Use CC64 (sustain pedal) for legato.
